name: NotDoxed
desc:
Hide personal info in common apps.

This tweak was originally made by KritantaDev. I am just hosting a modified copy, because the original was taken down from krit's repo.

See the original source code [here](https://github.com/KritantaDev/notdoxed) and my modified source code [here](https://github.com/WilsontheWolf/notdoxed).

screenshots.name: icloud.png
screenshots.accessibilityText: The name in the settings app being replaced with "iCloud".

screenshots.name: weather.png
screenshots.accessibilityText: The name in the weather widget being replaced with "Weather".

changelog.changes:
- Made iCloud screen say "iCloud" instead of being blank.
- Changed some internal stuff so I could compile it.
